body_html:
@apaszke Ohhh, it is indeed quite confusing by providing this API. The function copy_ already does the job, and it seems it is also not a good idea to support init_like to initialize parameters with same method as other parameters. It should be given to the user to clearly define by themselves.

If you think it's okay, I propose to close this issue. Thanks a lot
body_text:
@apaszke Ohhh, it is indeed quite confusing by providing this API. The function copy_ already does the job, and it seems it is also not a good idea to support init_like to initialize parameters with same method as other parameters. It should be given to the user to clearly define by themselves.
If you think it's okay, I propose to close this issue. Thanks a lot
body:
@apaszke Ohhh, it is indeed quite confusing by providing this API. The function `copy_` already does the job, and it seems it is also not a good idea to support `init_like` to initialize parameters with same method as other parameters. It should be given to the user to clearly define by themselves. 

If you think it's okay, I propose to close this issue. Thanks a lot
